catalog_info.title: Topics in Chinese Art
catalog_info.description: The seminar explores ways in which heaven is visualized in Chinese art. Topics include astrology, ceiling decoration, heaven-earth correlative cosmology, macro-microcosms, etc. Media include tombs, caves, buildings, and other structures. The periods covered range from the early to late imperial times. Students will be presented with a general body of literature and encouraged to explore their own specific topics.
